opinion.opinion_text:
The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of January 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare and Deliver Trial Transcript:
Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 2nd day of February 2005 to prepare and deliver trial transcript to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of January 2005.
